productDescriptions.healthInsurance: For you, your spouse and the whole family
productDescriptions.alarmMonitoring: To protect your home from intrusions

tarifSubtitle: Do you find the world of insurance complex and frustrating? So do we. Discover Avektoi, the new insurance that suits you.
tarifComment: Already insured? No Stress! We'll take care of canceling your old contract.

simple.title: Simple and fast
simple.description: Subscribe online in just a few clicks and sign your documents on your smartphone.
simple.bold: No more paperwork, here it's 100% digital.

flexible.title: Flexible and clear
flexible.description: Forget the usual insurer blah-blah. Avektoi adapts to your needs and offers you

sansFrais.title: No hidden fees
sansFrais.description: From start to finish, you know how much you pay. No more bad surprises.

toujours.title: Always by your side
toujours.description: A team of experts to assist you at any time by chat, email or phone.
toujours.bold: It's when and how you want it!

commentsTitle: We won't say we're the best,

caroline.name: Caroline
caroline.comment: Great insurance with a wide range of customization options and a lot of transparency!

thierry.name: Thierry
thierry.comment: Very professional, efficient in their approach, thank you.

estelle.name: Estelle
estelle.comment: Highly recommend their services, they were very helpful and transparent.

lucas.name: Lucas
lucas.comment: Quick response time and very friendly staff.

marie.name: Marie
marie.comment: Affordable prices and excellent coverage options.

jean.name: Jean
jean.comment: Had a great experience with their customer service.

sectionsHeader: Don't waste your time anymore, Avektoi is
sectionsHeaderSpan: the perfect solution at your fingertips.

1.title: Manage your contracts
1.description: From anywhere and at any time, access your documents from your client area.

2.title: Customize your coverage
2.description: With one click, tailor your insurance to your needs: choose from a multitude of options, add beneficiaries, adjust your coverage.

3.title: Track your reimbursements
3.description: Report your claim, check the progress of your file from your dedicated interface, and benefit from quick reimbursement.

detailsHeader: Adapted to your needs and budget,
detailsHeaderSpan: we surely have the insurance you need.

auto.title: Auto
auto.description: Protect your vehicle and its drivers, according to your needs and profile.

housing.title: Housing
housing.description: Tenant or owner, protect your 'home sweet home' and all your loved ones.

health.title: Health
health.description: For you, your spouse, or even the whole family, protect the health of those you love.

pet.title: Dog & Cat
pet.description: We know how much your best companion means to you. Don't hesitate, protect them!

pno.title: PNO
pno.description: Non-occupant owner's insurance for your rental property, at a mini price.

borrower.title: Borrower
borrower.description: Switch to cheaper mortgage insurance and save money!

alarm.title: Alarm and Monitoring
alarm.description: Protect your home from burglaries without breaking the bank!

detailsInfoDescription: We told you, no more unnecessary blah-blah here, we get to the point. So here are four things we can tell you about us:

compagnie.title: A real insurance company
compagnie.description: We are authorized by the ACPR, which has verified that we have the necessary funds to cover your claims. And for the record, we are only the third insurance company to be authorized in the last 35 years #soproud.

but.title: Our goal?
but.description: Innovate, modernize, and simplify insurance to offer you the best possible experience at the fairest price. Like you, we think that insurance is neither very clear, nor very fun, and rather complex... but that was before Avektoi!

acteurs.title: We are followed by many actors...
acteurs.description: Even better than Brad Pitt or Vincent Cassel and just as glamorous, we are supported by the world's largest reinsurers (Hannover Re, ...) and by the iconic Xavier Niel, founder of Free, who believes strongly in our project.

francais.title: French people who insure
francais.description: Avektoi was born in France, from the meeting of French entrepreneurs, experts in insurance and the web, who want to modernize the world of insurance. Our offices are in France, and we are close to you in case of need.

aideDescription: Find the answer to your question in our FAQ or chat with our team of experts.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find the answer to your question in our FAQ.

advisor.title: Talk to an advisor
advisor.description: You can ask all your questions here.

footer.title: Avektoi
footer.description: Finally, an insurance that truly meets your needs! We simplify, we innovate... just for you.
footer.disclaimer: As an insurance company approved by the Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution (ACPR), and in a transparency approach, we make our Solvency and Financial Condition Report (2023) public.
footer.links: Privacy Policy | Terms and Conditions | Legal Notice
